quote: And what if you're trying to knock out another man,"" she said, sarcastic. There was no expression in his cool blue eyes. ""Then I kiss him,"" he said in the calmest of voices. ""Now you try it.
quote_letters: AND WHAT IF YOURE TRYING TO KNOCK OUT ANOTHER MAN SHE SAID SARCASTIC THERE WAS NO EXPRESSION IN HIS COOL BLUE EYES THEN I KISS HIM HE SAID IN THE CALMEST OF VOICES NOW YOU TRY IT
